document.comments_message: 51998 2064772425 DOMINIC K. ASANT The docs accompanying this copy contain confidential information regarding the sender which is legally privileged. The information is intended only for the use of the individual or entity named above. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any dissemination, distribution, or copying of this telecopied information is strictly prohibited. If you have received this telecopy in error, please immediately notify us by telephone to arrange for the return of the original documents to us.
